home.heroSubtitle: Create and explore your family tree with ease.
home.welcomeDescription: Family Tree is a powerful tool to help you document, share, and visualize your family history. Whether you are a beginner or a seasoned genealogist, our platform provides a simple and intuitive way to connect with your past.
